name: Bump The Rock
description:
Aim accurately and watch your ammo. 
Bump the small rocks back to space and deflect the heaviest ones!

FEATURES
● Level up your ship to unlock automatic turrets and other powerful pieces of equipment.
● Defeat invaders to steal their spaceships.
● Collect stars to buy new skins for your spaceship.


Support
Are you having problems? Contact us at circledsquarestudio@gmail.com

Community
What do you think of the game? How can we improve it?
